title: Breathless
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Asthma
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Diseases
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
description: Episode of Series "Four corners (Television program)". This Four Corners episode considers the disturbing increase of asthma in Australia. It is estimated that more than one million Australians suffer from the disease. "Breathless" contains interviews with doctors and specialists working on the frontline offering a timely reminder that we are no closer to solving the mystery of this illness, or preventing the many deaths that are caused by it.
